attributes.description: Full service history, One owner from new, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles.
